name: Pattonville High School 2867 Robotics: The Official Game
name_original: Pattonville High School 2867 Robotics: The Official Game
description:
The official video game for Pattonville High School Robotics 2867 Degrees of Freedom (2021-2022 Season)!!!

Play as 2867 Degrees of Freedom as you overcome various challenges to achieve victory. Experience SIX different stages with THREE unique boss battles!

Featuring an original soundtrack composed by Jack Caesar

Game coded by Justin Alvey (see his non-school itch page here), loosely based off of the LibGDX Simple Game guide.
